title: Painting the Chinese landscape
creator_credit: Wan-go Wen and China Film Enterprises of America
brief_description: This film illustrates the four important steps in painting a Chinese landscape. Starting with a blank sheet of paper, we see the artist outline his layout, fill in his brush work, group together the related parts with shading, and finally retouch for emphasis.
